title: So does Riot ever use anything from the C&C board?
body: Or is this more for the players to share art?

replies.body:
Hey! 

We have used player concepts to create skins before, such as Pool Party Ziggs, Astronautilus and Void Fizz! 

This was the original idea for Pool Party Ziggs from MaTTcomGO - 

http://mattcomgo.deviantart.com/art/Pool-Party-Ziggs-297356891

We do skim the boards for ideas, and in fact, we have a place where we collect and save awesome concepts! When we go into an ideation for a champion, we'll pull up fan art that we have (as well as Googling 'cause there's a ton of LoL artwork out there) and see if there's anything that really hits home and makes sense for the champion.

While we may not create 100% of an original concept, we do take inspiration from fan art! 

To your other point, everyone is welcome to share fan art of existing skins/champions as well! :3
If someone's idea heavily influences a skin or champion, are they given any sort of reward, or even just acknowledgment?

>
> If someone's idea heavily influences a skin or champion, are they given any sort of reward, or even just acknowledgment?

I know there's a few Rioters that were hired or contracted based on the quality of their fan art pieces.
I can't speak to champion, as I'm on the skins team. But skins does frequently check out the boards for ideas.

:D

Nope! We have two different teams. Champion handles all the new champions coming out and Champion Update handles updating the existing content. Oh, and there's also skins who handles all the new skins content!
Mmm, I don't think we announce exact numbers, but the teams themselves are fairly large, and are comprised of several people for each art discipline.

Look at the most upvoted Champion concept there.

It's Kindred ;P

''So does Riot ever use anything from the C&C board?'' I think i answered your question with that

There is many fan-made skins as well.
I mean does Riot ever take ideas from the board to use in the game? And the post was made long after Kindred.

> [{quoted}](name=Bob7010,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=E273Fvwf,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-03-08T18:22:38.769+0000)
>
> I mean does Riot ever take ideas from the board to use in the game? And the post was made long after Kindred.

To my knowledge, no. Their design team is super busy, and if they browse these forums at all it's almost certainly just for their own amusement rather than professional interest in the designs found here.
It was posted half a year after Kindred was started...

The short answer: It's just for the community. 

The long answer: Riot has repeatedly stated they aren't going to pull champion concepts from here. People will post to this champion or that champion, claiming it's based on some concept, but in every case Riot's work started before then or the similarity is only barely there.
